      • setCategories

        @NonNull
public ContentBlocking.Settings setCategories(int cat)
        Set content blocking categories.
        Parameters:
        cat - The categories of resources that should be blocked. Use one or more of the AT_* or SB_* flags.
        Returns:
        This Settings instance.

      • getCategories

        public int getCategories()
        Get the set content blocking categories.
        Returns:
        The categories of resources to be blocked.

      • getCookieBehavior

        public int getCookieBehavior()
        Get the assigned cookie storage behavior.
        Returns:
        The assigned behavior, as one of COOKIE_ACCEPT_* flags.

      • setCookieBehavior

        @NonNull
public ContentBlocking.Settings setCookieBehavior(int behavior)
        Set cookie storage behavior.
        Parameters:
        behavior - The storage behavior that should be applied. Use one of the COOKIE_ACCEPT_* flags.
        Returns:
        This Settings instance.

      • getCookieLifetime

        public int getCookieLifetime()
        Get the assigned cookie lifetime.
        Returns:
        The assigned lifetime, as one of COOKIE_LIFETIME_* flags.

      • setCookieLifetime

        @NonNull
public ContentBlocking.Settings setCookieLifetime(int lifetime)
        Set the cookie lifetime.
        Parameters:
        lifetime - The enforced cookie lifetime. Use one of the COOKIE_LIFETIME_* flags.
        Returns:
        This Settings instance.
